import fastapi, aio_cron\n\
from fastapi import FastAPI, BackgroundTasks\n\
\n\
app = FastAPI()\n\
crontab = aio_cron.CronManager()\n\
\n\
@app.on_event('startup')\n\
async def startup():\n    crontab.start()\n\
\n\
@app.get('/task/')\n    async def task():\n        background_tasks = BackgroundTasks()\n        background_tasks.add_task(run_scheduled_task())\n        return {'message': 'Task scheduled!'}\n\
      ```"
